trans-unit.source: The return value of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> objects that the methods of this class create.
trans-unit.target: 此類別的方法所建立之 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> 物件的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Provides support for creating and scheduling <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供建立和排程 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> 物件的支援。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides two factories for creating and scheduling tasks:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供兩個處理站建立和排定工作：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory> class, which creates <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> and <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory>類別，建立<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>和<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601> class, which creates <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601>類別，建立<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601> class allows you to do the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601>類別可讓您執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Create a task and start it immediately by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立工作並立即開始藉由呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can call the overloads of this method to create and execute a task that requires non-default arguments.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫這個方法來建立和執行的工作需要非預設引數的多載。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method provides the easiest way to create a task with default configuration values and start it immediately.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法提供最簡單的方式使用預設組態值建立工作並立即開始它。

trans-unit.source: Create a task that starts when any one of the tasks in an array has completed by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAny%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAny%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立藉由呼叫其中一個陣列中的工作完成時啟動的工作<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAny%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAny%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Create a task that starts when all the tasks in an array have completed by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立工作，當陣列中的所有工作都完成都後，藉由呼叫啟動<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Factory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property returns a default <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 靜態<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Factory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會傳回預設值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can also call one of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601> class constructors to configure the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> objects that the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601> class creates.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以呼叫其中一個<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601>類別建構函式來設定<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>物件<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601>類別會建立。

trans-unit.source: The following example configures a new <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601> object to create tasks that have a specified cancellation token, task creation options, continuation options, and a customized task scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定新<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601>物件以建立具有指定的取消語彙基元、 工作建立選項、 接續選項和自訂的工作排程器工作。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, you do not have to instantiate a new <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601> instance.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，您不必具現化新<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use the static <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Factory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which returns a factory object that uses default values.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以使用靜態<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Factory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，它會傳回 factory 物件，會使用預設值。

trans-unit.source: You can then call its methods to start new tasks or define task continuations.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以呼叫其方法來啟動新的工作或定義的工作接續。

trans-unit.source: For an illustration, see the example.
trans-unit.target: 如需圖例，請參閱範例。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the static <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Factory%2A> property to make two calls to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601.StartNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用靜態<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Factory%2A>屬性使兩個呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601.StartNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The first task returns a string array that is populated with the names of files in the user's MyDocuments directory, while the second returns a string array that is populated with the names of subdirectories of the user's MyDocuments directory.
trans-unit.target: 第一項工作會傳回字串陣列，而第二個會傳回字串陣列，其中會填入使用者的 MyDocuments 目錄之子目錄的名稱填入使用者的 MyDocuments 目錄中的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%2CSystem.Action%7BSystem.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which displays information about the number of files and directories in the arrays returned by the two tasks after they have completed execution.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%2CSystem.Action%7BSystem.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，這個方法會顯示兩個工作完成執行之後傳回的陣列中的檔案和目錄數目相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: All public and protected members of <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 所有的 public 和 protected 成員的<see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" />是安全執行緒，且可能會從多個執行緒同時使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> instance with the default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設組態，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601> instance with a default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601>以預設組態的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>, and the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler> property is initialized to the current scheduler (see <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions>屬性會初始化為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions>屬性會初始化為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>，而<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler>屬性會初始化為目前的排程器 (請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The default cancellation token that will be assigned to tasks created by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> unless another cancellation token is explicitly specified when calling the factory methods.
trans-unit.target: 除非呼叫處理站方法時明確指定另一個取消語彙基元，否則為將指派給這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> 所建立之工作的預設取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> instance with the default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設組態，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601> instance with a default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601>以預設組態的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>, and the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler> property is initialized to the current scheduler (see <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions>屬性會初始化為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions>屬性會初始化為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>，而<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler>屬性會初始化為目前的排程器 (請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The scheduler to use to schedule any tasks created with this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 排程器，用來排定任何使用這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> 所建立的工作。

trans-unit.source: A null value indicates that the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" /> should be used.
trans-unit.target: null 值表示應該使用目前的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> instance with the specified configuration.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的組態，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: With this constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>, and the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler> property is initialized to `scheduler`, unless it's `null`, in which case the property is initialized to the current scheduler (see <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions>屬性會初始化為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions>屬性會初始化為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>，而<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler>屬性會初始化為`scheduler`，除非它有`null`中這種情況下的屬性會初始化為目前的排程器 (請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The default options to use when creating tasks with this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> 建立工作時要採用的預設選項。

trans-unit.target: 使用這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> 建立接續工作時要採用的預設選項。

trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions>屬性會初始化為`creationOptions`、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions>屬性會初始化為`continuationOptions`，而<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler>屬性會初始化為目前的排程器 (請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>)。

trans-unit.target: 除非呼叫處理站方法時明確指定另一個取消語彙基元，否則為將指派給這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> 所建立之工作的預設取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The default scheduler to use to schedule any tasks created with this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設排程器，用來排定任何使用這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> 所建立的工作。

trans-unit.target: null 值表示應該使用 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current" />。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的組態，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: With this constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions> property is initialized to `creationOptions`, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions> property is initialized to `continuationOptions`, and the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler> property is initialized to `scheduler`, unless it's `null`, in which case the property is initialized to the current scheduler (see <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions>屬性會初始化為`creationOptions`、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions>屬性會初始化為`continuationOptions`，而<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler>屬性會初始化為`scheduler`，除非它有`null`中這種情況下的屬性會初始化為目前的排程器 (請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>)。

trans-unit.target: 這個工作 Factory 的預設取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the default cancellation token that will be assigned to all tasks created by this factory unless another cancellation token value is explicitly specified during the call to the task factory methods.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回要指派給工作 factory 方法的呼叫期間明確指定另一個取消語彙基元值，這個處理站所建立的所有工作的預設取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions" /> enumeration value for this task factory.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個工作 Factory 的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the default continuation options for this task factory.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，這個值會指定這個工作 Factory 的預設接續選項。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the default continuation options for this factory.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性傳回的預設接續選項，這個 factory。

trans-unit.source: They will be used to create all continuation tasks unless other options are explicitly specified during calls to this factory's methods.
trans-unit.target: 它們將用來建立所有的接續工作，除非在呼叫此處理站方法時明確指定其他選項。

trans-unit.source: Creates a continuation task that will be started upon the completion of a set of provided tasks.
trans-unit.target: 建立會在提供的一組工作完成時啟動的接續工作。

trans-unit.target: 要接續之工作的所在陣列。

trans-unit.source: The function delegate to execute asynchronously when all tasks in the <c>tasks</c> array have completed.
trans-unit.target: 當 <c>tasks</c> 陣列中的所有工作都已經完成時，要以非同步方式執行的函式委派。

trans-unit.source: Creates a continuation task that will be started upon the completion of a set of provided Tasks.

trans-unit.source: Gets the task scheduler for this task factory.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個工作 Factory 的工作排程器。

trans-unit.source: The task scheduler for this task factory.
trans-unit.target: 這個工作 Factory 的工作排程器。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the default scheduler for this factory.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回此 factory 的預設排程器。

trans-unit.source: It will be used to schedule all tasks unless another scheduler is explicitly specified during calls to this factory's methods.
trans-unit.target: 它會用來排程所有工作，除非這個處理站方法的呼叫期間明確指定另一個排程器。

trans-unit.source: If this property returns `null`, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A> will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性會傳回`null`，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>將使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates and starts a task.
trans-unit.target: 建立並啟動工作。

trans-unit.source: A function delegate that returns the future result to be available through the task.
trans-unit.target: 函式委派，會傳回將可透過工作使用的未來結果。

trans-unit.source: Creates and starts a task.
trans-unit.target: 建立並啟動工作。

trans-unit.source: The started task.
trans-unit.target: 已開始的工作。

trans-unit.source: Calling `StartNew` is functionally equivalent to creating a task by using one of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> constructors, and then calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A> method to schedule it for execution.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`StartNew`其作用相當於使用其中一種建立工作<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>建構函式，然後呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A>方法來排程執行。

trans-unit.source: However, unless creation and scheduling must be separated, `StartNew` is the recommended approach for both simplicity and performance.
trans-unit.target: 不過，除非您必須分開建立和排程，`StartNew`是為了簡化和效能的建議的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="function" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="function" /> 引數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="creationOptions" /> parameter specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="creationOptions" /> 參數指定了無效的值。

trans-unit.source: A function delegate that returns the future result to be available through the task.
trans-unit.target: 函式委派，會傳回將可透過工作使用的未來結果。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token that will be assigned to the new task.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給新工作的取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that controls the behavior of the created task.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，這些值會控制已建立之工作的行為。

trans-unit.source: The task scheduler that is used to schedule the created task.
trans-unit.target: 用來排定所建立之工作的工作排程器。

trans-unit.source: Creates and starts a task.
trans-unit.target: 建立並啟動工作。

trans-unit.source: The started task.
trans-unit.target: 已開始的工作。

trans-unit.source: Calling `StartNew` is functionally equivalent to creating a task by using one of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> constructors and then calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A> method to schedule it for execution.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`StartNew`其作用相當於使用其中一種建立工作<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>建構函式，然後呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A>方法來排程執行。

trans-unit.source: However, unless creation and scheduling must be separated, `StartNew` is the recommended approach for both simplicity and performance.
trans-unit.target: 不過，除非您必須分開建立和排程，`StartNew`是為了簡化和效能的建議的方法。

trans-unit.target: 已處置建立 <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> 的取消語彙基元來源。
